data.title: Lompoc, California Population 2024
data.text:
Poverty in Lompoc

The race most likely to be in poverty in Lompoc is Multiple , with 26.36% below the poverty level.

The race least likely to be in poverty in Lompoc is White , with 10.46% below the poverty level.

The poverty rate among those that worked full-time for the past 12 months was 2.28% . Among those working part-time, it was 15.21% , and for those that did not work, the poverty rate was 26.48% .
